Server: Netscape-Enterprise/2.0a Date: Thu, 20 Nov 1997 20:09:15 GMT Accept-ranges: bytes Last-modified: Wed, 25 Sep 1996 12:58:56 GMT Content-length: 774 Content-type: text/html Security

Customer security is enhanced because the delivery of bulk CO2 generally does not require inside access to the customer's facility. NuCo2 utilizes a locking device on the fill port to eliminate the possibility of tampering. Since only NuCo2 has access to the fill port, it vitrually elimiinates pilfrage.
